info.brief_description: You are somehow shrunk at a preschool.
info.description:
You are Jeff, a 10 year old boy who is always having something bad happen to him. This time he is dropping his little brother Josh (3) off at Preschool or daycare when he faint and wakes up the size of an ant.


Jeff 10
Josh 3

This is a mostly unaware and vore story but not many rules just no female interaction. Jeff is invincible and can't die but can feel some pain. Feel free to add characters kids range from birth to 5 years.

Gift points will be given for good chapters.

Any questions feel free to email me!!!
